author: gmelachr
body: Modify prunedGenParticles_cfi.py to store daughters of Kshort and Lambda in the prunedGenParticle collection in order to use the daughter's production vertices for Kshort and Lambda lifetime measurements. The changes have been tested locally.
title: Changes to store Daughters of Kshort and Lambda in the miniAOD prunedGenParticle Collection
